languages.text: Писчие перья транскрибера оставляют на бумаге кляксы. После пары рывков неисправный манипулятор с пером остается в ваших руках. Больше он не будет мешать работе.

traits.locale_text: Писчие перья транскрибера с непроизвольным интервалом оставляют на бумаге неаккуратные кляксы. Вы дергаете несколько раз одно из неисправный перьев и часть его манипулятора отламывается, оказавшись в ваших руках.

languages.text: The transcriber's quills are leaving blots on the paper. After a couple of jerks, you are left holding the broken manipulator and quill in your hands. It will no longer be a disruption.
languages.original_text: Писчие перья транскрибера оставляют на бумаге кляксы. После пары рывков неисправный манипулятор с пером остается в ваших руках. Больше он не будет мешать работе.

traits.locale_text: The transcriber's quills are leaving blots on the paper. After a couple of jerks, you're left holding the broken manipulator and quill in your hands. It will no longer be a disruption.
The transcriber's quills are leaving blots on the paper. After a couple of jerks, you're left holding the broken manipulator and quill in your hands. It will no longer be a disruption.

The transcriber's quills are leaving blots on the paper. After a couple of jerks, you are left holding the broken manipulator and quill in your hands. It will no longer be a disruption.

languages.text: Las plumas del transcriptor están manchando el papel. Tras un par de tirones, te quedas con el manipulador roto y la pluma en las manos. Ya no dará problemas.
languages.original_text: The transcriber's quills are leaving blots on the paper. After a couple of jerks, you are left holding the broken manipulator and quill in your hands. It will no longer be a disruption.

traits.locale_text: Las plumas del transcriptor están manchando el papel. Tras un par de tirones, te quedas con el manipulador roto y la pluma en las manos. Ya no dará problemas.

languages.text: 転写機のクイルが紙に汚れを残している。何度かグイっと引っ張り、手の中には壊れたマニピュレーターとクイルだけが残る。そこにもはや混乱はない。
languages.original_text: The transcriber's quills are leaving blots on the paper. After a couple of jerks, you are left holding the broken manipulator and quill in your hands. It will no longer be a disruption.

traits.locale_text: 転写機のクイルが紙に汚れを残している。何度かグイっと引っ張り、手の中には壊れたマニピュレーターとクイルだけが残る。そこにもはや混乱はない。

languages.text: 转录器的羽毛笔在纸上留下了墨迹。一番折腾之后，你将破损的调制器与羽毛笔拆了下来，这些损坏的零件再也不会干扰机器运转了。
languages.original_text: The transcriber's quills are leaving blots on the paper. After a couple of jerks, you are left holding the broken manipulator and quill in your hands. It will no longer be a disruption.

traits.locale_text: 转录器的羽毛笔在纸上留下了墨迹。一番折腾之后，你将破损的调制器与羽毛笔拆了下来，这些损坏的零件再也不会干扰机器运转了。

languages.text: Die Federn des Transkriptors hinterlassen Flecken auf dem Papier. Nach einem kräftigen Ruck hältst du den defekten Manipulator samt Feder in den Händen. Er stört die Maschine nicht länger.
languages.original_text: The transcriber's quills are leaving blots on the paper. After a couple of jerks, you are left holding the broken manipulator and quill in your hands. It will no longer be a disruption.

traits.locale_text: Die Federn des Transkriptors hinterlassen Flecken auf dem Papier. Nach einem kräftigen Ruck hältst du den defekten Manipulator samt Feder in den Händen. Er stört die Maschine nicht länger.

languages.text: Les plumes du transcripteur laissent des taches sur le papier. Après quelques secousses, le manipulateur et les plumes vous restent dans les mains. Au moins, cette partie du mécanisme ne posera plus problème.
languages.original_text: The transcriber's quills are leaving blots on the paper. After a couple of jerks, you are left holding the broken manipulator and quill in your hands. It will no longer be a disruption.

traits.locale_text: Les plumes du transcripteur laissent des taches sur le papier. Après quelques secousses, le manipulateur et les plumes vous restent dans les mains. Au moins, cette partie du mécanisme ne posera plus problème.

languages.text: Kâtibin tüy kalemleri, kâğıtta leke bırakıyor. Birkaç kere çekiştirmenin ardından kırık çevirteç ve tüy kalemi çıkarıyorsun. Artık aksama yapmayacak.
languages.original_text: The transcriber's quills are leaving blots on the paper. After a couple of jerks, you are left holding the broken manipulator and quill in your hands. It will no longer be a disruption.
